author: potuz
content: I can't speak for the execution side, the consensus side of withdrawals is trivial to implement. However, it includes a new message to be transported on the p2p network. It will require a new tooling to sign that message offline, communicate this to users. Very **very** extensive testings (since this would be the first time that slashable offenses may get capital out of the system) and that would take at least as long as the timeline to Shanghai IMO
